rows.label: qev050401_MSG0001
rows.name:
Not long now until the duel. Rrrrgh...
I am a dead man.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050401_MSG0002
rows.name:
Why did it have to be like this? I only ever wanted the
freedom to live as I choose.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050401_MSG0003
rows.name: ...Hmm? Y-you are human![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050401_MSG0004
rows.name:
Hold, human! I would have a moment of your time.
For I have encountered many rumors of New LA,
and wish to hear of it from one who lives there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050401_JNK0010
rows.name: Answer

rows.label: qev050401_SEL0011
rows.name: Share a few nuggets of recent NLA news.

rows.label: qev050401_JNK0020
rows.name: Question

rows.label: qev050401_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask De Ezich why he is so interested in NLA.

rows.label: qev050401_MSG0005
rows.name: You are too kind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050401_MSG0006
rows.name:
...Mmm. yes. I see. What a stimulating place!
Truly, the more I hear of your city,
the more amazing it sounds.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050401_MSG0007
rows.name:
I would very much like to visit it someday,
but alas, I am being kept in here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050401_MSG0068
rows.name:
But hearing your stories only makes me more
determined to see it for myself! For you see,
we Wrothians had nothing so exciting back home.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050401_MSG0008
rows.name:
...You care about that? How fascinating.
You humans truly are curious about everything![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050401_MSG0009
rows.name:
I heard about your city from some friends who have
been there. I heard that there is a freedom which does
not exist here...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050401_MSG0010
rows.name:
And ever since, I've spent my time in this cave
dreaming of what New LA must be like.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050401_MSG0011
rows.name:
In my mind's eye, it's bustling and beautiful—nothing
like the drab gloom of a Wrothian city. Why, I wager
you see new and surprising things every day![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050401_MSG0012
rows.name:
Ahh, I am so envious! I would give anything to live in
a place like that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050401_MSG0013
rows.name:
And I could work as a BLADE, taking on whatever
duties I liked, free from stuffy Wrothian traditions and
obligations.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050401_MSG0014
rows.name:
Speaking of which, what manner of work do you do?
You certainly have the look of a warrior...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050401_JNK0030
rows.name: Explain

rows.label: qev050401_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell De Ezich that you are a BLADE.

rows.label: qev050401_JNK0040
rows.name: Refute

rows.label: qev050401_SEL0041
rows.name: Tell him being a BLADE isn't all sunshine and lollipops.

rows.label: qev050401_MSG0015
rows.name: A BLADE?! Fate truly has smiled upon me this day![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050401_MSG0016
rows.name: I apologize, human. I meant no offense.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050401_MSG0017
rows.name:
I meant only that BLADEs are allowed to work by their
own say-so. Not like the duty-bound slavery of we
Wrothians.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050401_MSG0018
rows.name:
...Hold a moment. Are YOU a BLADE? Ha!
Fate has truly smiled upon me this day![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050401_MSG0019
rows.name:
So BLADEs are mercenaries that do tasks for others,
yes? Even people of other races?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050401_MSG0020
rows.name:
In that case, I would cry your aid, mighty BLADE.
For I have been challenged to a duel by a fellow
Wrothian.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050401_MSG0021
rows.name:
My foe has the strength of many men. And while I am
not one to back down from a fight, I know when I am
outclassed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050401_MSG0022
rows.name:
Is there any way you could act as my proxy and defeat
my enemy for me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050401_MSG0023
rows.name:
Blessed day! I was quite worried, you see.
My foe is rather...upset with me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050401_MSG0024
rows.name:
If I fought, he'd likely beat me half to death.
Or perhaps even all the way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050401_JNK0050
rows.name: Assure

rows.label: qev050401_SEL0051
rows.name: Tell De Ezich he has nothing to worry about now.

rows.label: qev050401_JNK0060
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev050401_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask De Ezich how things came to this point.

rows.label: qev050401_MSG0025
rows.name:
Impressive. If you were a Wrothian, you'd tell me to
fight the duel and die with quiet honor. To be honest,
I prefer how you humans operate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050401_MSG0026
rows.name:
That said, my foe has not wronged me so badly.
Try not to hurt him too much if at all possible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050401_MSG0027
rows.name: Er, it's...complicated.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050401_MSG0028
rows.name:
Perhaps some things are simply better left unsaid.
I ask instead for you to clear your mind and focus
on the duel to come.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050401_MSG0029
rows.name:
I will say, however, that my foe has not wronged me
so greatly. Try not to hurt him too much if possible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050401_MSG0030
rows.name:
Oh, and if after your great victory you can strike a
heroic pose and cry out "De Ezich is now free!"
that would be perfect.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050401_MSG0041
rows.name:
You may hear some nonsense from the others about
something I did or...whatnot, but pay it no mind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050401_MSG0042
rows.name:
Just win that duel and cry out, "De Ezich is now free!"
That is all I need.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050401_MSG0043
rows.name:
I am counting on you, mighty BLADE!
...Er, you should probably set out for Sylvalum now.
...Oh, and whatever you do, don't lose.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050401_MSG0044
rows.name:
YES! Now I truly AM free! It's just as they say—justice
always triumphs in the end![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050401_MSG0045
rows.name:
My mother and father are far too uptight!
It's always Wrothian pride this, Prince Jiarg that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050401_MSG0046
rows.name:
Duty, glory, and pride can all go hang—
give me drink, dice, and dozens of dames!
I'll take whatever, so long as it's fun.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050401_MSG0047
rows.name:
Starting today, I am joining human society and
doing what I will, when I will! So long, Wrothians!
And good riddance![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050401_MSG0048
rows.name:
Fare well, [ST:playername ]!
I shall see you back in New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050401_JNK0090
rows.name: Approve

rows.label: qev050401_SEL0091
rows.name: Let De Ezich go.

rows.label: qev050401_JNK0100
rows.name: Scold

rows.label: qev050401_SEL0101
rows.name: Lecture De Ezich for his disrespectful attitude.

rows.label: qev050401_MSG0049
rows.name:
Good-bye, stifling Wrothian culture!
...Oh, and I shall pay you for your help once I make it
to the city, [ST:gender p1=hero p2=heroine ]. Safe travels to you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050401_MSG0050
rows.name:
Hmm? Where does this come from? And why are you,
a human, getting angry?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050401_MSG0051
rows.name:
Life as a Wrothian must seem abnormally formal to
you, must it not?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050401_MSG0052
rows.name:
...What?! It seems a lot more dignified than the
convenient fantasies of a twerp like me?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050401_MSG0053
rows.name:
Blast! The whole point of this was to finally be rid of
all the lecturing. But you are no better than my parents![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050401_MSG0054
rows.name:
Traitorous dog! I'll beat you and TAKE my freedom!
I'll prove that I can fight for myself![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050401_MSG0055
rows.name:
...You humans truly are amazing, running a city like
this just one wall away from a monster-infested
wilderness.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050401_MSG0056
rows.name:
You all have a sense of purpose, yet you live free
and enjoy your own lives. I'm so very glad I escaped
that miserable cave.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050401_JNK0110
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev050401_SEL0111
rows.name: Smile and tell De Ezich to enjoy the freedom.

rows.label: qev050401_JNK0120
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev050401_SEL0121
rows.name: Tell De Ezich that life in NLA has its own struggles.

rows.label: qev050401_MSG0057
rows.name:
Ah, my favorite word! From here on out, I'll not live
my life for Ga Jiarg or the pride of the Wrothians.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050401_MSG0058
rows.name:
I believe that, coming from you. You seem like you
have been through a lot. What has happened in this
fair city?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050401_MSG0059
rows.name:
I still do not know much of what is beneath the surface
here, but I plan on learning all of it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050401_MSG0060
rows.name:
Still, the freedom cannot be beat! Here, life is about
more than Ga Jiarg or Wrothian pride.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050401_MSG0061
rows.name:
I am finally going to live life for myself! Back home,
they would have torn into me for wanting that.
They'd call it shallow and feckless.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050401_MSG0062
rows.name:
But I call it happiness! Whatever comes of it,
good or ill, I can accept it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050401_MSG0063
rows.name:
...Here. This is my thanks for all you've done.
It's no small sum, but I'm feeling flush with cash after
selling off my sword![ST:wait ]
